item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

Hi ive been having problems adding a easter event on my server!
if(NPCID == 1835){
NpcDialogue = 125;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}
if(!playerHasItem(7931, 10)){
NpcDialogue = 127;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}

this is what i add i want it when i have 10 Easters Eggs i can get a Easter Ring
like it sais come back when you have 10 eggs when u have 10 eggs it tells u
Thank you here is your reward.

Please help
